summary: REQ-51 is partially implemented: a release-build script and signing placeholder files were added, and the script copies the Gradle release APK to a clearly named output file. However, the provided diff summary is truncated for the main build guide, so it is not fully verifiable that the APK output location/path and signing steps are documented as required. The diff also includes substantial unrelated frontend feature work and modifications to an explicitly immutable path (frontend/src/main.tsx), which were not requested for the APK-artifact task.

missing_requirements.requirement: Document the single, clearly named release APK output file and its location/path for maintainers, and clearly state required values/steps for release signing when the keystore is not committed.
missing_requirements.reason: While the build script copies to build-outputs/PhoenixBoutique-release.apk and prints the location, the primary documentation file (ANDROID_RELEASE.md) is truncated in the diff summary right after 'From the frontend/ directory, run:', so it is not confirmable from the provided evidence that the required output path and signing steps are documented there as acceptance criteria require.

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of unrelated frontend feature/UI/data-model changes (orders, payments, audit exports, luxury styling, navigation updates) not requested by REQ-51.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to generate and document an Android release APK artifact; these app feature changes are outside scope and risk violating constraints (e.g., no new functionality).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (modified; lists many application feature changes)

hallucinated_features.description: Modification to an explicitly immutable file path: frontend/src/main.tsx (removing Internet Identity provider).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints state 'Do not modify immutable frontend paths' including frontend/src/main.tsx; changing it is unrequested and violates constraints.

hallucinated_features.description: Project state metadata updated to include broad production build scope (Android APK/AAB and iOS IPA) beyond the requested Android release APK artifact.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest non-goals explicitly exclude iOS IPA artifacts; updating project_state.json to claim iOS IPA preparation is unrequested.
evidence: project_state.json (modified; summary mentions "Android APK/AAB and iOS IPA")
